website_summaries.verdict: If you want a fun covered dog bed, this pineapple shaped bed has a unique design.
pros: Interior pad has a really soft cushion that holds its shape well
Cute design that adds a sense of fun to the room
Works best with small and medium sized dogs
Exterior material is tougher than it looks, so it will stand up to regular use
cons: Cushion must be hand-washed when it's time to clean

website_summaries.verdict: A fun and spacious bed used for sleep and play that looks cute, too.
pros: The bed provides plenty of space and privacy
Removable cushion is easy to wash
The bed is not just for sleeping – many cats bring toys inside and play throughout the day
The pineapple design is bright and adorable
cons: Cushion is quite firm and may need an extra blanket

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves This!!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is kinda weird. We didn't want anything to do with this pineapple for about two months. Then one morning we found him in it. He all of a sudden decided it was his new favorite thing. He sleeps in it all day long. I like how the pad inside is removable so it can be washed or lint rolled. This pineapple is decent quality and holds it's shape very well. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so cute. It’s good quality and that’s been very helpful since my 4 pound puppy loves to attack it. She tries to rip off the green top and then (somehow) throws it around. She loves it. My Maltese is 8 pounds, he’s sitting next to it. I bought them the medium size. My puppy is hidden in the shadow but she is tiny and still manages to drag it across the room. It hasn’t ripped at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Bunnies love the Pineapple Express
customer_reviews.text: My holland lops love this and took to it right away. Not sure the cushion will make it through the night as I hear them constantly "updating" their new house :) it did come yellow just like a pineapple! Very happy with quality and price! So cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its shape, looks cute, happy pets!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought this for my silkie chickens that are inside until their coop is built. The pineapple bed is a thick foam material. It arrived collapsed. Once opened it maintained a nice, even shape and looked adorable. The color is a crisp yellow. My chickens enjoy hanging out in it. I bought the small size. I would say this size would work for cats or tiny dogs. It is tall but the round bed space is small. It is perfect for what I needed it for, I’m very happy with how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Calismith509

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size. My chihuahua/ jack russell fits inside with ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size. My chihuahua/ jack russell fits inside with lots of extra space. We took out the pad that goes inside just to put his favorite animal inside. Whatever works to make him comfortable. He likes it, we like it. It is well made and the foam allows it to hold its form pretty well. I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Red 'n irritated

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CAT BED!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed for my two cats. I ordered the medium size, since I have one bigger cat (he is about 14 pounds). The bed is nice and roomy and the structure of the item is great! It seems well made and my cats have used it since it arrived at the house! Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Reed

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but material was too thin for my digging bunny
customer_reviews.text: The pineapple looks cuter in person and was roomy. The lining material was thinner and looser than I expected and my bunny immediately started digging at the cushion. I wrapped it in fleece and a pillow case because she had dug/bitten a hole in it and I didn't want her to eat the foam. I found out later she was chewing on the walls so I have taken it away from her. The lining material feels like the same as the cheap halloween costumes you can get a super market. I wish it was the same fuzzy material as the outside because I think that's sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!🍍We (and our cats) love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this to arrive, and was thrilled to see that it’s even cuter in person! It took less than a day for our curious little cats to go crazy for it too. So happy we finally got this—I wasn’t sure they’d like it! FYI: The small one is the perfect size for an adult male cat.
customer_reviews.author: J&S

customer_reviews.title: YAS YAS and more YAS
customer_reviews.text: YAS YAS and more YAS. If you love your cat and hate them getting hair on your couch or denting the back cushions because they lay there, then look no further. A tiny apartment that isn’t tiny (my girl is curvy and she has SO MUCH SPACE IN THE LARGE) your cat will love you and this home so much. I come home to her inside of it constantly. It’s so adorable. I’ve taken close to 262937292 pictures. ❤️ Spoil your little today
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Saghbazarian

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent house!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9lb Maltese and she loves this house - the large size fits perfectly. Like others have said, it took a month or so (because of the factory smell) for her to get use to it, and treats helped. It may be easily collapsible but she's pretty mild- even with digging in it the foam has stayed up nicely for the past year. she gets lots of compliments on her "beach-themed property" and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Any

customer_reviews.title: TOO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I have a little rat terrier who absolutely adores her pineapple house, so much so that she will not let me move it anywhere. The only thing I don't like is how fragile the fabric can be. My pitbull has been scolded for trying to play with this pineapple house and the fabric began stretching and ripping a little just the couple of times she's went for it. Now she knows not to play with this product so I think we're good!
customer_reviews.author: A. Walls

customer_reviews.title: Fun Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! SO silly and cute. The medium is the perfect size for my 20lb French bulldog. He sleeps in it all the time. My one and only complaint is that the pad on the floor of the bed is not very soft or pillow like. It's just a piece of foam. But I put a blanket in for my dog and that seemed to do the trick. It's definitely. A conversation piece and it's always amusing to watch the pineapple shake as my little guy adjusts his sleeping position :)
customer_reviews.author: K. McGinty

customer_reviews.title: but the stiitching is good enough to hold everything together
customer_reviews.text: On first arrival, I thought my dog would tear it to shreds in an instant, but its lasted months! light weight, but the stiitching is good enough to hold everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Took my little cat about 2 days before she crawled in and became the cutest most comfortable kitty in a pineapple. Feels like it'll withstand normal wear and tear. Was folded in the shipping box but immediately retained it's shape. I love that the pad has a little Velcro piece to keep it in place and can be easily removed and cleaned. It's a little taller than I expected but who cares! My little Miss Peach loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed exterior but pillow not cushy enough
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and my 10 lb toy aussie uses it every day, but I would usually throw a piece of clothing in there to make it more comfortable. Otherwise, I would hear him scratching at and fluffing the base cushion non-stop. It is a piece of 1" foam in a cover. My dogs prefer the batting-filled cushions to sink into.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N. Haas

customer_reviews.title: So freaking cute
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund puppy needed some coaxing to go into it, and now he LOVES it. He loves lying in it and biting and running around with it (haha). It's pretty durable, though! The only thing I'd say is that the cushion inside is soft but could be softer. A little blanket does the trick, though!
customer_reviews.author: ClarissaRosen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely 100% worth it. I got the smallest option. He had a fish bed there before but he didn't like it. Put this up and he crawled right in and went to sleep. Pure Joy! Came into shape instantly out of the box, not crushed or creased, has excellent form and thickness, and a soft cushion that can be removed for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Liewer

customer_reviews.title: Our cat went right in (small pineapple) and it's so cute! Kids love it too.
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old cat loves his pineapple! It's so cute. We ordered the small pineapple and he fits perfectly. The kids love this because it reminds them of Spongebob (who lives in a pineapple). The pad at the bottom is pretty thin, but our cat doesn't seem to care--he's asleep in his pineapple at least 50% of the time that he sleeps. At some point I may either make a 'duvet' for the pad or just make a new pad that is a little thicker. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: 058674G38XEOG93475

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Home
customer_reviews.text: Stands up well and holds its shape, seems warm and cozy. The cushion you put in it is nice and cushy. My cats didn’t know what to make of their new pineapple home at first ;) but they warmed up to it. So cute! Also, it was cheaper on Amazon rather than PetCo.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cat Bed!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is in love with this bed. He spends most of his nap time in it. He's a clean, short haired cat, so I haven't tried to clean it yet. It looks awesome in the house and is a great conversation piece. People love it. I bought the small and he weighs 10 lbs. I think it's a bit big for him but apparently he approves of the extra room.
customer_reviews.author: CRunk

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The cutest kitty bed/cave!!!! My kitten loves this pineapple cave to snuggle in and feel safe. Its his own spot to chill in, sleep, and sometimes he plays in it! He weighs 3 lbs and is 12 weeks old and there’s plenty of room to grow. It’s just so darn cute...buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pineapple for my 4 pound American/dutch rabbit. She loves it but she completely tore through the memory foam pad! but the pineapple still stands even when the bottom is just packed with soft fleece! Highly recommend removing the foam pad if purchased for a rabbit 🐇
customer_reviews.author: Chimaera

customer_reviews.title: More like a playhouse than bed for our pups--tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our pups think this is the coolest toy. They love to wrestle in it, romp in and out of it, turn it upside down, drag it across the floor, and burrow under the cushion. The one thing they don't do in it? Sleep! Go figure! I am not sure how long it will hold up, but in the meantime, it is providing the pups--and us!--plenty of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: WHOOOO LIVES IN A PINEAPPLE UNDER THE SEA.....
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had a pineapple bed! I freaking love this thing and so does my silky terrier. He dis the usual inspection and scratching inside the bed and totally loves it. We love it. It's fun, ool to look at.... it's a pineapple! Hell yes! Completely happy wit my purchase. I purchased the medium for those wondering about size for a small dog. Medium size for my 6-7lb Silky Terrier :-) hope that helps. Pics provided.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This pet house is very cute and quite realistic. Our cat loves it now! Took him a bit to get used to it, definitely worth the money. Has foam insert for more comfort and with it being removable make cleaning/vacuuming a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Threeandcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: CON: The "cushion" inside is loose and the cats started messing with it immediately. Also, the bottom isn't heavier than the rest of the pineapple so it's easily rolled over or flipped. PRO: The medium was much bigger than I expected and could fit both of my adult cats. Also, when it got dirty we put it in the washer and air dried it and it came out like new.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: I initially really liked the pineapple pet house... it really does look exactly like the picture, however it is HORRIBLE quality i've had it only 2 days and already the seam has a hole in it, exposing the padding inside... Also the "leaves" at the top are already ripping away from the pineapple.. highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but not necessarily comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love the pineapple and wanted a bed for one of my cats to be able to go into and be safe from the other cat (the bigger one would kick him out of his open bed). At first he didn’t go into it much, but when I took a smaller/simpler bed that he already liked and put it inside, he started using it all the time. So apparently the inside needs to be made a little more comfy, but with that adjustment, now he loves it and he goes in there all the time to sleep and to protect himself from the other cat.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my maltipoo, but she is scared of it. However, my youngest cat has gladly taken it over and loves it. It is super cute and easily folds.
customer_reviews.author: SBR

customer_reviews.title: Our cat Miso LOVES this pineapple fort!
customer_reviews.text: We got this today and our cat has barely left it all day, she is obsessed with it already. It is super cute, really bright colors (very yellow!), and quite sturdy. The bed part inside is easy to remove if we need to clean it, and it’s really soft. It reminds me of a thick comfy mattress pad covered in soft fabric. Highly recommend this!! For reference, we ordered the Small and our cat is around 8.5 pounds; she fits perfectly in there with room to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a riot!!! My pom is 5 lbs and loves running in and hiding her toys, wrestling around and taking them out. Sadly, she prefers sleeping in my bed. It's still super cute in my apartment and matches other pineapple decor I have! haha!
customer_reviews.author: OnlineBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This arrived cute and bright in color, like the ad. However, the pineapple is not easy to clean. There is no zipper for the bottom pillow.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeLove

customer_reviews.title: It’s cure
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves hers! Haven't washed it yet so no comment on that
customer_reviews.author: OBKATHY

customer_reviews.title: Tootsie’s Staycation
customer_reviews.text: My only peeve about this bed is the cushion. I wish it had a removable cover that was washable. It requires a lot of vacuuming and it soils very easily.
customer_reviews.author: EXTRaORDINARY YoU by Susan

customer_reviews.title: Order the medium for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old toy chihuahua terrier Jax loves his new home! It was the perfect size! I bought the medium, and thank God I didn’t get the small lol, it would’ve been too small. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Damaged when washed!
customer_reviews.text: Washed the inside once and it fell apart! I’m very disappointed I wish it was easier to clean because my cat loves this bed! :(
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great size for pet rabbit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this adorable pineapple for my rabbit! It’s nice and soft and the fabric is easy to clean. All you have to do is throw it in the washer. Comes with a little foam bottom for pet comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Heyman

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this pineapple bed and I'm so glad I bought the large one. Its roomy and they both cat fit if they chose.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: Fun cat/dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved it! It’s big but worth the money! Base is removable for cleaning! Good packaging too!
customer_reviews.author: twilightreader3

customer_reviews.title: For small/medium dogs only
customer_reviews.text: my puppy loves this! He's a 25 pound beagle and fits perfectly. Would be too small for a dog any bigger than him
customer_reviews.author: beth adan

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute! The medium size fits my 13lb puppy perfectly and she loves it! *update a few weeks later: she REALLY loves it 🥰
customer_reviews.author: suruh

customer_reviews.title: very large
customer_reviews.text: This item is very big, I bought it for my guinea pig thinking it would be smaller and it’s not. More for a cat
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bed, most importantly my sun conures love it the most! That’s what they sleep in. They sleep on my bed in the pineapple... love it
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: To small for medium
customer_reviews.text: The bed is lovely but I think it’s a little to small to be considered a medium
customer_reviews.author: Maggy G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and the cats favorite
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves it! I have a shark house too but he prefers the pineapple. It feels sturdy and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for rodents !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my two guinea pigs and they immediately become safe and relaxed once I put them in there with a blanket .
customer_reviews.author: Amy Yonda

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute puppy bed as well as toy! My pup run into this pineapple when he is excited. It started to tear some parts already but I still give 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: PPo

customer_reviews.title: Great cat house!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my cat and he loves it! He also loves to scratch it and play with it. I think he likes the fact that he can really hide in this pineapple. Some comments said it was orange but I still see it as a darker yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I brought this out my cat went to sit inside!
customer_reviews.author: Sakeenah

customer_reviews.title: It only took a year
customer_reviews.text: It only took a year for my cat to like the pineapple hut. When I first got it she was more enthused by the box then the hut. But the past couple weeks she goes to take naps in there and it's adorable so it was definitely worth the purchase. Also when there are people over she has a place to hide but can still watch what is going on in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat won't go in but it is cute
customer_reviews.text: The damn cat prefers a cardboard box but we store her toys in it and it is cute
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My little dog (+ 15month old son) love this little hideaway nap area!
customer_reviews.author: Dezaree Webb

customer_reviews.title: this is giant. like bouncy house big
customer_reviews.text: this is giant. like for a great dane. takes up way to much room for even a med sized dog.
customer_reviews.author: christian m.

customer_reviews.title: The cushion on the inside is decent at best. I would have given it 5 stars if ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our bunny. It is very cute and does what it's intended to do but I decided to give it 4 stars because of the price. I feel that it is definitely a bit over priced. The cushion on the inside is decent at best. I would have given it 5 stars if it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne D.

customer_reviews.title: Order small but get medium/large
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute, as expected, but i received a medium/large instead of the small i ordered. I can fit my whole upper body in it. I will most likely have to return it as i really needed the small one.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pineapple bead! Just perfect for our senior yorkie, as it is well padded and supports his frail bones. Very stable design, and so adorable!!!
customer_reviews.author: TravelGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's pomeranian and she loves it. It is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Psatk

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed in the Product
customer_reviews.text: What I received was not at all what I expected. The product does not stand on its own, keep its shape, or has any real comfort/padding to it. My foster kittens won't go near the thing. Unfortunately it was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: The product fell apart easily after a few days of light use by our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jobu01940

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: So mine came yellow, which I was thankful for. It's very cute and well made, holds it's shape really well! Unfortunately my cat has only been in it a few times, usually needs to be coerced into it. She prefers under the bed, I guess. But I have no complaints about the product! So worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan & Kelsea

customer_reviews.title: Adorable product. The green leaf pieces were loose in ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable product. The green leaf pieces were loose in the package and a long green thread was hanging from the top. The box was pretty much destroyed, but that is certainly not their fault. It took me a few minutes to use the remaining thread and sew the pieces on the top, so it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Anne (Plumbkrzy)

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Bed
customer_reviews.text: My cat is super picky and usually hates sleeping on anything that is remotely labeled a "cat bed." However, she adores the pineapple bed, and started using it immediately. It is also super cute. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kelly Lynch

customer_reviews.title: The small size is pretty big
customer_reviews.text: The small size of the pineapple is way larger and roomier than expected. Perfect because one of my cats is over 15 lbs and he fits in there with no issue! Gives plenty of room for him to sit upright as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. The cat loves it and looks adorably ridiculous coming out the door.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Product description is false
customer_reviews.text: This product description is a lie. I ordered a 16 inch by 16 inch by 2 inch pet pineapple for a small dog or cat and got a 6 inch pineapple for a bird or something PACKED IN A GIANT-3x2x1ft-BOX FILLED WITH INFLATED PLASTIC PACKAGING.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra B Fields

customer_reviews.title: Our Corgi is a huge fan!
customer_reviews.text: Our Corgi absolutely loves this. She was cautious at first but now she's in there all the time! So freakin' cute!
customer_reviews.author: Samalander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My cat immediately crawled inside it when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE how it looks- I would give it 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE how it looks- I would give it 5 stars for this. However, it doesn't stand up very well. My dog thought it was a big toy and it got rocked
customer_reviews.author: C-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Looks just like the picture. My daughter’s mini dachshund loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: D White

customer_reviews.title: Kylo’s Pineapple 🍍
customer_reviews.text: Kylo loves his pineapple 🙂 He is on the small side for a Beagle (22lbs) & fits well curled up against the back wall. However, he is 6-1/2 months old now and if he keeps growing will soon have to find different accommodations- Perhaps a Giant Kiwi for Kylo? 🥝
customer_reviews.author: Krisma

customer_reviews.title: Beachy comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for our beach themed house! Our animals loved the comfort of it! Very easy to clean as the pad comes out!
customer_reviews.author: Grabber

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitties
customer_reviews.text: Cats loved this, fought over it, had to order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Our Boston Terrier likes to snuggle in this bed, it looks so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer char

customer_reviews.title: It's big !
customer_reviews.text: You'll be shocked at how nice and we'll seen it is ! The little cushion is removable too. Seriously, it's legit.
customer_reviews.author: William Harner

customer_reviews.title: Seems comfortable and good size
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! I love it and most importantly, my kitty loves it.... It took some time for him to get comfortable, coz there was a weird smell when i first opened the bag... But the smell quickly dissipated and Ananas loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Neha Athavale

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed because I thought it would be so cute for my puppy. And I was right! Not only is it whimsical but he loves it. At first he was a little skeptical about it but after an hour I literally could not get him out of it. He would poke his little head out and when you went to get him he would quickly back in. Adorable. Good quality too. Bigger than I thought it was gonna be.
customer_reviews.author: Teagan

customer_reviews.title: Who lives in a pineapple under my roof?
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves her new home. She has never taken to a cat bed before, but she was instantly in love with this cute pineapple. It’s nice and firm and stays upright, but also cozy on the inside and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat
customer_reviews.text: Whooooo lives in a pineapple under the tv??? This guy!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pineapple
customer_reviews.text: This is such a adorable item for a small dog or cat or two cats to snuggle in. Very nice quality and looks just like the photo. The bed pad comes put for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Trinette kinney

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size, the small on must fit a hamster
customer_reviews.text: This item is adorable but I ordered a large for my 50 lb Basset Hound, the would fit a small dog no larger than 15 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Starr

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My three cats love to cuddle inside. It's very good quality. The bottom bed padding is removable and washable. highly recommend it since I got lots of great comments. :)
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tran

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: This doghouse is really adorable but, our dog refuses to sleep in it. We think it scares her because she's spoiled. The padding on the bottom is pretty thin so we added extra " cushy" stuff but, still no luck. We did not send it back, we just use it for a "doggy" toy box instead!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Reeser

customer_reviews.title: COMFY AND ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: Our cat absolutely loves this bed. It’s super super cute to see her enjoy it too. Do not hesitate, you and your cat will not regret this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ross

customer_reviews.title: It's a must buy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it , When it's raining or thundering she goes inside and feels protected she can rest and stretch
customer_reviews.author: Ellena

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and my cats love it! Cute bed to have in any room!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great accent for a Hawaiian themed room for pet
customer_reviews.text: For Noelle the House cat .... she crawled in as soon as it was unpacked and spends her time napping there when we’re in the office ....
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Pineapple Love
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love their pineapple!!! They take turns napping in it. And I smile everytime I look at it.
customer_reviews.author: RLH

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought it for my daughters cats. They love it. Plush. Adorable, bright yellow. Keeps it shape, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hopper

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves this Pineapple House!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great purchase! I bought the small and my cat Bear just loves it! Plenty of room for him to lay down and the bottom cushion is removable for easy vacuuming. I think he digs living in his Pineapple under the sea!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A. Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Great size, even for larger cats or small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: One of our kitties immediately loved this bed! The opening is large and the included pillow is soft. I added one of their favorite blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The cats love it. I have 2 pretty large cats and they fit in there pretty ok. One at a time of course. Would recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aaaayyyyoooo
customer_reviews.text: So awesome my little man has his own SpongeBob house aaayyyoo
customer_reviews.author: AnuSTART4all

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I received it the padding was dirty and it was ripped, very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Hepner

customer_reviews.title: Too stinkin cute. Puppy grew too fast.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Too stinkin cute. Puppy grew too fast...its his toy box.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: They like it
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected. Both my cat (12-13lb) and kitten (5-6 lb) fit At the same time with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves it!! Strange at first fir him but he got the idea ❤️.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Not Yellow!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, perfect size for my Frenchie. But it was not yellow like a pineapple should be....it is orange-really orange, and kind of looks like a carrot. Good thing her name is Bunny I guess...still a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley

customer_reviews.title: My 10 pound kitty loves this! It was much ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 pound kitty loves this! It was much larger than expected, she has plenty of room to stretch out!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bertel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pet bed
customer_reviews.text: It was way bigger than I expected. I bought it for my 12 lb cat and he LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Oldham

customer_reviews.title: It's hilarious and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as much for me as I did for my cat. It's hilarious and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: julieb
